title: How to Use Power Armor in Fallout 4

steps.title: Locate a power armor suit.
steps.content: Locate a power armor suit. For most players, you'll end up stumbling into your own suit in Concord.

steps.title: Locate a Fusion Core.
steps.content: Locate a Fusion Core. Power armor in Fallout 4 runs entirely on fusion energy. Without a Fusion Core, they're pretty much useless. Fusion cores last 20 minutes (10 hours in game) each.

steps.title: Apply the Fusion Core to the power armor suit.
steps.content: Apply the Fusion Core to the power armor suit. This will power it up.

steps.title: Enter the suit.
steps.content: Enter the suit. Simply press A/X a second time after inserting the Fusion Core to climb in.

steps.title: Use the power armor HUD in place of your Pip-Boy.
steps.content: Use the power armor HUD in place of your Pip-Boy. Switch out weapons, armor, and heal if necessary.

steps.title: Press and hold A/X to exit the power armor.
steps.content: Press and hold A/X to exit the power armor. Leave it in a safe place when you are finished with it.
